B. 20-1911                            Sanitarium, California May 22, 1911 -5-                              April 30, 1911 

Elder J. A. Burden Loma Linda, California 

Dear Brother and Sister Burden: 


     On Wednesday evening we took the train at Los Angeles. We had good accommodations, and nothing in particular transpired to cause any unpleasantness. It was a very long 
                                                                           310
train of cars. We had a good lunch, and were all very comfortable.
